u-region-select/converter.description: Converter between value and values. Optional value: `'join'` means joining the values   array into value. `'join.number'` is similar to `join`, but it will be considered as a number. situation. You can also use `:` to modify the separator, similar to Vue's command parameters. `'last-value'` means that the value of the last item is used as the value. You can also pass in an object containing { get, set }.
